Notification.Subject: Microsoft Teams must be updated to fix an issue.

Question.Label: WhenToUpdate
Question.Header: Microsoft Teams must be updated to fix an issue. You won't be able to use it during the update (ca. 10 minutes).
Question.Body: What time would work best for you to receive the update ?
Question.Comment: Is there anything else you would like us to be aware of?

Definition.FinalMessage: Thank you for your feedback. We will do our best to meet your preference.

Notification.Subject: Your device has been isolated from the network

Question.Label: Access will be restored soon
Question.Body: Your device has been temporarily isolated from the network because malicious software has been detected
Question.Footer: In order to protect the organisation, you will be momentarily unable to access network and Internet. A security specialist has been notified and you will be contacted soon. You can contact us for questions on [it-helpdesk@aonnetwork.com](mailto:it-helpdesk@aonnetwork.com?subject=Isolated%20device)

Notification.Subject: Network access restored

Question.Label: Access has been restored
Question.Body: Your device has been reintegrated into the network
Question.Footer: This issue has now been resolved and you once again have access to the network and Internet. You can contact us for questions on [it-helpdesk@aonnetwork.com](mailto:it-helpdesk@aonnetwork.com?subject=Isolated%20device)

Notification.Subject: Your device has been cleaned

Question.Label: Your device has been cleaned
Question.Body: Cleaning has been completed and you should now have more disk space. If this is not the case, then please contact the IT helpdesk.
Question.Footer: You can contact us for questions on [it-helpdesk@aonnetwork.com](mailto:it-helpdesk@aonnetwork.com?subject=Low%20disk%20space)

Notification.Subject: Your device is running low on disk space

Question.Label: Clean disk
Question.Header: Your device is running low on space. Let us help you free up some space.
Question.Body: Would you like us to clean your disk?
Question.Footer:
Light clean: clean recycle bin and temporary internet files Deep clean: also cleans your downloads folder
You can contact us for questions on [it-helpdesk@aonnetwork.com](mailto:it-helpdesk@aonnetwork.com?subject=Low%20disk%20space)

Question.Label: Ask again
Question.Body: Should we ask you again?

Notification.Subject: Outlook crash resolved

Question.Label: Outlook crash resolved
Question.Body: Your Outlook crash issue has been resolved
Question.Footer: We've taken steps to resolve your issue with Outlook. You should once again be access your e-mail. Does it work? If not, you can re-open [the ticket that was automatically created for you](http://nxt-automation-demo:81/service_desk/myrequests_outlook.html) or you can contact us for questions on [it-helpdesk@aonnetwork.com](mailto:it-helpdesk@aonnetwork.com?subject=Outlook%20crash)

Notification.Subject: Video issues fixed

Question.Label: Your video issues have been fixed
Question.Body: Your media player's codecs have been reinstalled
Question.Footer: We've taken steps to fix your video codecs, you should once again be able to launch your video. Does it work? If not, you can re-open [the ticket that was automatically created for you](http://nxt-automation-demo:81/service_desk/myrequests_codecs.html) or you can contact us for questions on [it-helpdesk@aonnetwork.com](mailto:it-helpdesk@aonnetwork.com?subject=Video%20codecs)

Notification.Subject: Battery replacement required

Question.Label: Battery health poor
Question.Body: Battery replacement required
Question.Footer: Your battery has been detected as being in poor condition. Please click Schedule appointment to schedule a battery replacement at your nearest IT help desk. You can contact us for questions on [it-helpdesk@aonnetwork.com](mailto:it-helpdesk@aonnetwork.com?subject=Battery%20health)

Notification.Subject: Your device is running low on disk space

Question.Label: Clean disk
Question.Header: Your device is running low on disk space.
Question.Body: Would you like us to clean your disk?
Question.Footer: Light clean: clean recycle bin Deep clean: clean recycle bin and temporary files

Notification.Subject: Cleanup process completed

Question.Label: CleanupCompleted
Question.Body: Disk cleanup has been completed.

Notification.Subject: Repair process completed

Question.Label: Repair Completed
Question.Body: Office repair has been completed.

Notification.Subject: We need to run Office maintenance tasks

Question.Label: Repair Office
Question.Header: All your Office applications need to be closed.
Question.Body: Please, save your current work to let us proceed

Notification.Subject: Chrome needs to be closed to solve your issue

Question.Label: CloseChrome
Question.Header: Chrome needs to be closed now to solve your issue.
Question.Body: Would you like us to close Chrome now?

Answer.Label: NoClose
Answer.Caption: No, I don't want to close Chrome now

Question.Footer: All unsaved work will be lost when closing

Notification.Subject: Your device requires restart

Question.Label: Restart Device
Question.Header: Your device is running too long without restart, or is pending OS patch installation.
Question.Body: Would you like us to initiate the restart?
Question.Footer: Postpone: Postpone restart till tomorrow Now: Schedule restart with short delay. Please save all your work before accepting

Notification.Subject: SharePoint Experience

Question.Label: Productivity
Question.Header: We're trying to improve our service quality and to that end we'd like to ask you eight questions that should take less than 5 minutes to answer. Please try to think in terms of your day to day activities.
Question.Body: Does SharePoint allow you to accomplish your job?

Answer.Label: Yes, but problems
Answer.Caption: 😐 Yes, but I often have problems with it

Question.Label: Importance
Question.Body: How important is SharePoint to you?

Question.Label: Proficiency
Question.Body: How would you rate your proficiency using SharePoint?

Answer.Label: Novice
Answer.Caption: I feel lost and I can rarely achieve what I want to do

Answer.Label: Beginner
Answer.Caption: I usually achieve what I want to do but sometimes need help

Answer.Label: Competent
Answer.Caption: I know enough to achieve what I want to do

Answer.Label: Proficient
Answer.Caption: I'm proficient, people sometimes ask me for help

Answer.Label: Expert
Answer.Caption: I'm an expert, I'm known as a reference in the company

Question.Label: Positive points
Question.Body: What do you like about SharePoint?
Question.Comment: If there is another thing, please comment here.

Question.Label: Negative points
Question.Body: What do you not like about SharePoint?

Answer.Label: Nothing
Answer.Caption: There is nothing I don't like

Question.Comment: If there is another thing, please comment here.

Question.Label: Rating
Question.Body: How would you rate your overall SharePoint experience?

Notification.Subject: How satisfied are you with your IT environment?
Notification.Footer: Please take 1min to give us your feedback.

Question.Label: Satisfaction
Question.Header: We care about your workplace experience — Please take 1 min to share your feedback
Question.Body: How satisfied are you with your IT environment at [Company name]?​
Question.Footer: Your IT environment includes everything related to information technology (IT): devices, software, connectivity, policies, support, training, office infrastructure, etc.

Question.Label: Device sentiment
Question.Body: How satisfied are you with the performance and reliability of this computer?

Question.Label: Productivity sentiment
Question.Body: How satisfied are you with your browser and office applications?

Question.Label: Additional feedback
Question.Body: What else could be improved?

Answer.Label: access restrictions
Answer.Caption: 🔐 Access restrictions to applications, files, etc.

Lang.T: Wie zufrieden sind Sie mit Ihrer IT Umgebung?
Bitte nehmen Sie sich 1 min um uns Feedback zu geben.
Wie zufrieden sind Sie mit Ihrer IT Umgebung bei [Name der Firma]?
Ihre Zufriedenheit ist uns wichtig — Bitte nehmen Sie sich 1 min um uns Ihr Feedback zu geben.
Ihre IT Umgebung umfasst alles was mit Informationstechnologie (IT) zu tun hat: Geräte, Software, Konnektivität, Regeln, Büroinfrastruktur, etc.
Wie zufrieden sind Sie mit der Leistung und Zuverlässigkeit dieses Computers?
Wie zufrieden sind Sie mit Ihrem Browser und Büroanwendungen (Word, Google Docs, etc.)?
Etes-vous satisfait de votre environnement informatique ?
Merci de prendre 1min pour nous faire part de vos commentaires.
A quel point êtes-vous satisfait de l'environnement informatique de [Nom de l'entreprise] ?
Nous souhaitons vous offrir une meilleure expérience digitale - Merci de prendre 1 minute pour partager vos commentaires
L’environnement informatique comprend tout ce qui est en lien avec les technologies informatiques: ordinateurs, logiciels, connectivité réseau, politique informatique, support, formation, etc.
Merci d’avoir répondu à ce questionnaire.
A quel point êtes-vous satisfait des performances et de la fiabilité de cet ordinateur ?
A quel point êtes-vous satisfait de votre navigateur internet et des applications Office ?
Y-a-t-il quelque chose d'autre qui peut être amélioré ?
(Optionel) Y-a-t-il autre chose dont vous voulez nous faire part ?
📽️ Equipement informatique dans les salle de réunion
🔐 Restrictions d'accès aux applications, fichiers, etc.

Notification.Subject: We want to improve your work experience.

Question.Label: Satisfaction
Question.Header: Please take 1 minute to answer this simple question.
Question.Body: How satisfied are you with your IT experience at Acme Inc.?
Question.Footer: IT experience is the degree to which the technology you use at work (PC, software, printer, etc.), as well as the IT processes and IT colleagues you interact with, enable you to get your job done.

Question.Label: Follow-up
Question.Body: Which elements of your IT experience are you unhappy with?

Answer.Label: businessapps
Answer.Caption: Business applications I use to work

Question.Comment: What is the primary reason for your choice?

Lang.T: Wir möchten Ihre IT-Erfahrung am Arbeitsplatz verbessern.
Klicken Sie "Anzeigen", um mehr zu erfahren.
Wie zufrieden sind Sie mit Ihrer IT-Erfahrung bei Acme Inc.?
Bitte nehmen Sie sich eine Minute Zeit, um diese Frage zu beantworten.
Die IT-Erfahrung umfasst die genutzte Technologie für die Arbeit (PC, Software, Drucker etc.), IT-Prozesse und die IT-Kollegen, mit denen Sie zu tun haben, um Ihre Arbeit auszuführen.
Mit welchen Aspekten Ihrer IT-Erfahrung sind Sie unzufrieden?
Was ist der Hauptgrund für Ihre Angabe?
Nous souhaitons vous offrir une meilleure expérience au travail.
Cliquez sur "Afficher" pour en savoir plus.
Etes-vous satisfait de votre expérience IT chez Acme Inc. ?
Merci de prendre une minute pour répondre à cette question.

L’expérience IT définit dans quelle mesure les technologies que vous utilisez dans l’entreprise (PC, logiciels, imprimante etc.), les processus informatiques et les interactions avec l’équipe informatique vous aident à faire votre travail.
Quels sont les éléments qui dégradent la qualité de votre expérience IT ?
Suite de productivité (Word, Outlook, Teams, Skype, ...)
Quelle est la principale raison de votre choix ?

Notification.Subject: In order to improve your experience with your computer, we would like to know if you are you losing time because of IT issues.

Question.Label: IT issues
Question.Header: We would like to have your opinion on how we can help improve your experience with your computer.
Question.Body: Have you faced any IT issues recently? (e.g. computer issues such as slowness, application issues such as crashes...)
Question.Footer: You can contact me for any question

Question.Label: On which items?
Question.Body: On which of the following items are you usually losing time?

Answer.Label: System crashes and hard resets
Answer.Caption: My computer freezes and I have to restart it

Answer.Label: Application issues (crashes, hangs...)
Answer.Caption: My applications are sometimes slow or they freeze

Answer.Label: Long device boot/logon
Answer.Caption: My computer is slow to start

Answer.Label: Meeting rooms booking
Answer.Caption: I lose time booking meeting rooms

Answer.Label: Conference calls issues
Answer.Caption: Conference call system does not work well

Answer.Label: Remote work issues
Answer.Caption: I have issues when I work remotely

Answer.Label: Projection issues
Answer.Caption: I have issues when I need to project my computer screen

Question.Label: Time lost estimation
Question.Body: How much time do you think you lose daily due to IT issues?

Definition.FinalMessage: Than you very much for taking the time to answer!

Notification.Subject: We would like to update you on the remote working policy at Acme Inc.

Question.Label: Information
Question.Header: We have proactively enabled the firewall on your device. While the company works from home, making sure your device is secure is more important than ever.
Question.Body: We have included information on [how to browse the web securely](http://www.example.com) that you may find useful.
Question.Footer: If you have any questions or concerns, please contact your Service Desk.
